recipe.name: Farro and Oat Pilaf with Peas
recipe.img: 1 Farro and Oat Pilaf with Peas.jpg
recipe.ingredients: 170 grams farro 57 grams oat groats 1 teaspoon salt 900 grams water 1 onion, peeled and quartered 2 tablespoons butter 30 grams parmesan cheese 90 grams (1 cup) frozen peas

step.describe: Add the farro, oat groats, salt, and water to the bowl.
Pour the cooked grains into a fine-mesh strainer. Discard the liquid and put the grains into a bowl. Cover the bowl to keep it warm.
Add the onion and butter to the bowl.
Scrape down the sides of the bowl.
Add the cooked onion to the grain, then add the parmesan cheese and frozen peas. Stir to combine. Serve warm.
